title: Any cheap laptops that can run league?
body:
I was looking to buy a new laptop exclusively for league but you know... College is going ham on my wallet.

My price range is anything under 700.

Any recommendations please? As long as I have over 40 fps I'm golden.

replies.body:
A $500 laptop purchased brand new 5-6 years ago could run this game at a consistent 60+ FPS. I know this because personal experience.

With a budget of $700 nowadays, there's nothing you could buy that would have performance problems on this game. Hell, you'd probably be able to run modern games at a fairly stable 30 FPS on middle-ish video settings.

Your best bet would probably be to look over the [**minimum specs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654) and compare that to any laptops you're looking at. I'd hate to suggest something and it not be up to your standards.
